column4: Hi folks,  I have a Lenovo Thinkpad (still odd saying that) in a dock. All is well except the screen size is odd. I have an external monitor (22" LG). AWN is positioning itself in the real-estate taht would occupy my laptop monitor.
All other apps do exceed the laptop frame but do not hit the bottom of the 22" screen and think the top of the screen is higher than it i.s
first place i'd take a look at would be the thinkwiki...
